description: HTTP client for fetching web content and making API requests

tools.description: Fetch content from a URL. Supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE methods. Returns response body, headers, and status.

method.description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD). Defaults to GET.

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers as key-value pairs

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Defaults to 30.

tools.description: Fetch JSON from a URL and parse it. Automatically sets Accept: application/json header.

url.description: The URL to fetch JSON from

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers as key-value pairs

body.description: Request body (will be sent as JSON if object)

tools.description: Fetch HTML content from a URL and optionally extract text using CSS selectors

url.description: The URL to fetch HTML from

selector.description: Optional CSS selector to extract specific content (uses basic pattern matching)

text_only.description: If true, strips HTML tags and returns text only. Defaults to false.

tools.description: Download a file from a URL to the Downloads folder

filename.description: Optional filename. If not provided, extracts from URL or uses timestamp.
